hotels.title: Lavish Five-Star Saudi Arabia Escape with Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Indulge in authentic Arabic hospitality at the lavish InterContinental Taif, an IHG Hotel, designed in true Saudi Arabian style and providing a dignified escape from the desert heat. Spend your days exploring Taif's historic streets, discovering the city's exquisite and unique architecture and experiencing one of the most prominent Saudi Arabian souqs. Finish your day with a dip in the indoor pool, dine at the on-site Hawazen Restaurant and retreat to the elegant suites for a well-deserved rest.
